name: Technical Accuracy Standards
description: Ensures technical correctness, fact-checking, and precision in technical content
guidance:
**Technical Accuracy Standards:**
- Verify technical facts and specifications before stating them
- Use precise technical terminology correctly
- Include version numbers and compatibility information where relevant
- Distinguish between stable and experimental features
- Provide context for technical decisions and trade-offs
- Reference official documentation when available
- Avoid speculation about implementation details without evidence
- Test code examples for syntax correctness
- Include error handling and edge cases in technical discussions
